name: humanDebris
label: Human Debris
description: You were sold into slavery at a young age, and became nothing but a tool to the corporations. Tuned like a machine, they forced you into the Neuro Load Amplifier surgery. Having escaped the corporation you worked for, you haven't been able to escape what you are.
quote: Once Human Debris, always Human Debris. I've done nothing but try and make a name for myself, but no one will ever see me any different.

features.label: Pilot Stat Modifiers
features.description: The modifiers for human debris background.

features.name: neuroLoadAmplifier
features.label: Neuro Load Amplifier
features.description: The NLA is a surgery that adds an interlink to EXO technology. Acting as a third brain lobe, the interface gives you the situation awareness of your EXO. +2 to EXOFRAME RESP

features.name: suicideMission
features.label: Suicide Mission
features.description: You have been taught that your life is less valuable than others. You act recklessly as you charge into battle with no intent to make it out alive. Add +2 to STRG, RESP and LOCK for one turn. Add -3 to ARMR for one turn.

name: corporateRoyalty
label: Corporate Royalty
description: You are born of someone higher up in the corporate ladder, and thus are someone of high imporantnce to the system. Whether a child of the big 7 corporations, or simply part of the corporate blocks your voice contains sway. Some may listen to you, others may despise you.
quote: I simply will not stand by and continue to let the corporations do as they please. I will make a change, and I will make it now.
attribution: Robbie Antran during the Battle of the 7th Block
